entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C

Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
